t: Pillowtex Pillows, Blankets, Bedding, Plushies, More
s: The company supplied bedding for many reputable hotel chains, including Ritz Carlton, Marriott and Sheraton. Their growth became unmanageable, and in 2009 Pacific Pillows acquired the Pillowtex brand, continuing the legacy of American-made luxury linens and pillows.
